channel.title: Starter base? [Question]
channel.description:
Hi all, Can anybody give me the link to a good starting source that they know of that is stable and has the following:
Specials home is varrock pking in wildi levelings not to easy or hard
Thanks very much. Kiz

item.title: Starter base? [Question]
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

[quote=“Kizbits2000, post:3, topic:216949”]ah very true?
lol why didn’t I think of that, Must be having one of my special days, Lool :D[/quote]i would recommend devoultion or pimpscape, or something like that as a starting base, and then you can look in the tutorials for help on adding stuff to it.
